verses.verse: <S%H310>Afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his [birth.]
"Let the <S%H3117>day<s%> perish on which I was to be <S%H6>born,<s%> And the <S%H3205>night<s%> [which] <S%H3915>said,<s%> 'A <S%H559>boy<s%> is <S%H1397>conceived.<s%>'
"May that <S%H3117>day<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> Let not <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H1875>care<s%> for it, <S%H408>Nor<s%> <S%H5105>light<s%> <S%H3313>shine<s%> on it.

"Let <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H6757>black<s%> <S%H6757>gloom<s%> <S%H1350>claim<s%> it; Let a <S%H6053>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>settle<s%> on it; Let the <S%H3650>blackness<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1204>terrify<s%> it.

"[As for] that <S%H3915>night,<s%> let <S%H652>darkness<s%> <S%H3947>seize<s%> it; Let it not <S%H2302>rejoice<s%> among the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>year;<s%> Let it not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3391>months.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> let that <S%H3915>night<s%> be <S%H1565>barren;<s%> Let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7445>joyful<s%> <S%H7445>shout<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> it.
"Let those <S%H6895>curse<s%> it who <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> Who are <S%H6264>prepared<s%> to <S%H5782>rouse<s%> <S%H3882>Leviathan.<s%>

"Let the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of its <S%H5399>twilight<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened;<s%> Let it <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%> but <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>none,<s%> <S%H408>Neither<s%> let it <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6079>breaking<s%> <S%H7837>dawn;<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> it did not <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>opening<s%> of my [mother's] <S%H990>womb,<s%> Or <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
<S%H4100>"Why<s%> did I not <S%H4191>die<s%> at <S%H7358>birth,<s%> <S%H3318>Come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> and <S%H1478>expire<s%>?
<S%H4069>"Why<s%> did the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H6923>receive<s%> me, And <S%H4100>why<s%> the <S%H7699>breasts,<s%> that I should <S%H3243>suck<s%>?

"For <S%H6258>now<s%> I would have <S%H7901>lain<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H8252>been<s%> <S%H8252>quiet;<s%> I would have <S%H3462>slept<s%> <S%H227>then,<s%> I would have <S%H5117>been<s%> at <S%H5117>rest,<s%>
With <S%H4428>kings<s%> and [with] <S%H3289>counselors<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> Who <S%H1129>rebuilt<s%> <S%H2723>ruins<s%> for themselves;
<S%H176>Or<s%> with <S%H8269>princes<s%> who had <S%H2091>gold,<s%> Who were <S%H4390>filling<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> [with] <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
<S%H176>"Or<s%> like a <S%H5309>miscarriage<s%> which is <S%H2934>discarded,<s%> I would not be, As <S%H5768>infants<s%> that <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
<S%H8033>"There<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> from <S%H7267>raging,<s%> And <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3019>weary<s%> are at <S%H5117>rest.<s%>
"The <S%H615>prisoners<s%> are at <S%H7599>ease<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> They do not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5065>taskmaster.<s%>
"The <S%H9512>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> are <S%H8033>there,<s%> And the <S%H5650>slave<s%> is <S%H2670>free<s%> from his <S%H113>master.<s%>
<S%H4100>"Why<s%> is <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to him <S%H9416>who<s%> <S%H9416>suffers,<s%> And <S%H9132>life<s%> to the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> of <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

Who <S%H2442>long<s%> for <S%H4194>death,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none,<s%> And <S%H2658>dig<s%> for it <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> for <S%H4301>hidden<s%> <S%H4301>treasures;<s%>
Who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> <S%H413>greatly,<s%> <S%H1524><s%> They <S%H7797>exult<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6913>grave<s%>?
"[Why is light given] to a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hidden,<s%> And whom <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H9353>hedged<s%> in?
"For my <S%H585>groaning<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> at the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H3899>food,<s%> And my <S%H7581>cries<s%> <S%H5413>pour<s%> out like <S%H4325>water.<s%>
"For <S%H6343>what<s%> I <S%H6342>fear<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> upon me, And <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H3025>dread<s%> <S%H935>befalls<s%> me.
"I am not at <S%H7951>ease,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> am I <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> And I am not at <S%H5117>rest,<s%> but <S%H7267>turmoil<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>"
